name: The Moth
description:
GAME IS LOUD. You have been warned.

Press Escape for controls list and some info. I've included map of the Island in the folder.

This is a game I've done in the past (about a year ago) as a challenge to make a game in one week. I was planning to make more games of different genres  in a week every now and then but I'm too lazy.

The game was available on my Twitter but nobody cared so I've decided to upload it here for (hopefully) some feedback.

If you like the game (or not) please leave some feedback.
